title: GME Crash: GameStop Tribute Meme Coin on Solana Plunges 52%
description: Just like the meme stock of the same name, the GME tribute coin based on GameStop is falling hard after this week’s spikes.

title: Trump says AI could be the most dangerous thing out there: ‘It’s so scary’
description:
The GOP frontrunner claims even experts can be fooled by AI — “there’s no solution.”

Former United States President and current Republican party front-runner Donald Trump recently sounded off on the topic of artificial intelligence (AI), calling it “the most dangerous thing out there” and warning “there’s no real solution” during an interview with Fox Business’ Maria Bartiromo.

Trump’s commentary was revealed in a teaser for an upcoming segment on Bartiromo’s Sunday Morning Futures show on Fox Business. The interview is slated to air on Feb. 4.

Related: AI deepfakes fool voters and politicians ahead of 2024 US elections — ‘I thought it was real’

Read more

title: CoinStats introduces AI-driven Exit Strategy feature to maximize crypto profits
description:
Crypto portfolio app CoinStats has unveiled an innovative artificial intelligence (AI)-powered Exit Strategy feature on its platform, empowering traders to optimize their profits effectively, according to a Feb. 2 statement shared with CryptoSlate. The feature would allow crypto investors to strategically determine the optimal selling price for their cryptocurrency assets within their wallets. The asset […]

The post CoinStats introduces AI-driven Exit Strategy feature to maximize crypto profits appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin’s price pressures starting to be ‘exhausted,’ Coinbase analysts say
Bluechip Gives Synthetix and Beanstalk Stablecoins F Grades; Tokens Added to the ‘Red Flag List’
description: On Feb. 1, 2024, the independent, nonprofit stablecoin assessment entity Bluechip made a noteworthy declaration. They officially bestowed an F grade upon Synthetix’s fiat tokens SUSD and SEUR, alongside Beanstalk’s dollar-pegged asset BEAN. Bluechip went on to reveal that both of these stablecoins have been included in the organization’s “Red Flag List,” signaling a strong […]

title: Victoria VR to debut crypto-focused metaverse app on Apple’s Vision Pro
description: Victoria VR, a pioneering developer at the intersection of cryptocurrency and Virtual Reality (VR), has announced an ambitious project to enhance the VR industry. The company is on the brink of launching the first metaverse application from a blockchain entity on Apple’s Vision Pro headset. title: SHIB Burn Rate Jumps by 3,039% as Community Members Torch 115M Tokens
description:
The Shiba Inu community has doubled down on their commitment to reduce the meme coin’s supply as the SHIB burn rate soared immensely in the past 24 hours following days of muted performances.  Data from the SHIB burn tracker, Shibburn, reveals a 3,039% jump in the past 24 hours. During that time, over 115 million […]

The post SHIB Burn Rate Jumps by 3,039% as Community Members Torch 115M Tokens appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: KIP Protocol Closes Strategic Funding Round Led by Animoca Ventures
description:
Hong Kong, China KIP Protocol, the Web 3.0 base layer for AI (artificial intelligence), has successfully closed its strategic funding round led by Animoca Ventures. KIP Protocol builds secure and gas-efficient Web 3.0 infrastructure that makes it possible for AI creators – whether app developers, model makers or data owners – to do the following. […]

The post KIP Protocol Closes Strategic Funding Round Led by Animoca Ventures appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: What is Mercury Layer?
description:
A New Kind of Bitcoin Layer 2 Protocol Mercury Layer, created by Commerce Block, represents a significant advancement in Bitcoin’s layer 2 scaling ecosystem, focusing on enhancing privacy and efficiency through statechains. Mercury Layer enables the off-chain transfer and settlement of Bitcoin Unspent Transaction Outputs...

The post What is Mercury Layer? appeared first on Bitfinex blog.
